<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><span class="doxyHighlight">    N = Numerator;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint64&#95;t Prob64 =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><span class="doxyHighlight">        (Numerator &#42; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static&#95;cast&lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">uint64&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">&gt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(D) + Denominator / 2) / Denominator;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchprobability">BranchProbability</a></span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchprobability/#a0333345669e75a54c7de3d5fe0f6e746"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchprobability/#a0333345669e75a54c7de3d5fe0f6e746">BranchProbability::getBranchProbability</a>(uint64&#95;t Numerator,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Scale down Denominator to fit in a 32-bit integer.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Scale = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Denominator &gt; UINT32&#95;MAX) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Denominator &gt;&gt;= 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Scale++;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchprobability/#a9f95570835c021da093ddad5204192ca">BranchProbability</a>(Numerator &gt;&gt; Scale, Denominator);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If ConstD is not zero, then replace D by ConstD so that division and modulo</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// operations by D can be optimized, in case this function is not inlined by the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// compiler.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;u</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight">32&#95;t ConstD&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69" lineLink="#aa8c7ae7da7990d5320b67c57f6fc3b59"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> uint64&#95;t <a href="#aa8c7ae7da7990d5320b67c57f6fc3b59">scale</a>(uint64&#95;t Num, uint32&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>, uint32&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a6a9f043784cf87001c84980afa76da82">D</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ConstD &gt; 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a6a9f043784cf87001c84980afa76da82">D</a> = ConstD;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a6a9f043784cf87001c84980afa76da82">D</a> &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;divide by 0&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Fast path for multiplying by 1.0.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!Num || <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a6a9f043784cf87001c84980afa76da82">D</a> == <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Num;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Split Num into upper and lower parts to multiply, then recombine.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t ProductHigh = (Num &gt;&gt; 32) &#42; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t ProductLow = (Num &amp; UINT32&#95;MAX) &#42; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Split into 32-bit digits.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint32&#95;t Upper32 = ProductHigh &gt;&gt; 32;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint32&#95;t Lower32 = ProductLow &amp; UINT32&#95;MAX;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint32&#95;t Mid32Partial = ProductHigh &amp; UINT32&#95;MAX;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint32&#95;t Mid32 = Mid32Partial + (ProductLow &gt;&gt; 32);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Carry.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Upper32 += Mid32 &lt; Mid32Partial;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t Rem = (uint64&#95;t(Upper32) &lt;&lt; 32) | Mid32;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t UpperQ = Rem / <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a6a9f043784cf87001c84980afa76da82">D</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check for overflow.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (UpperQ &gt; UINT32&#95;MAX)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm-c/datatypes-h/#a30654b4b67d97c42ca3f9b6052dda916">UINT64&#95;MAX</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Rem = ((Rem % <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a6a9f043784cf87001c84980afa76da82">D</a>) &lt;&lt; 32) | Lower32;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t LowerQ = Rem / <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a6a9f043784cf87001c84980afa76da82">D</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t Q = (UpperQ &lt;&lt; 32) + LowerQ;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check for overflow.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Q &lt; LowerQ ? <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm-c/datatypes-h/#a30654b4b67d97c42ca3f9b6052dda916">UINT64&#95;MAX</a> : Q;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
